meta.title: WoT Playground
meta.description: Test and explore the Nostr Web of Trust API in real-time. Query trust distances, scores, and social graph connections.

hero.title: WoT Playground
hero.subtitle: Test the Web of Trust API in real-time. Query distances, trust scores, and explore your social graph.

login.title: Connect to Nostr
login.subtitle: Sign in with your Nostr identity to access the playground and test the Web of Trust API.
login.noExtensionHelp: Install a Nostr signer extension like Alby, nos2x, or Keys.band to continue.
login.nip07Notice: Uses NIP-07 to securely access your public key. Your private key never leaves your extension.

extension.title: Browser Extension
extension.help: Click below to connect using your installed Nostr signer extension.

key.title: Private or Public Key
key.inputHelp: Use nsec for full access or npub for read-only mode
key.securityNote: Your private key is stored in session storage and cleared when you close the tab. For better security, use an extension or bunker.

bunker.title: Remote Signer (Bunker)
bunker.scanHelp: Scan this QR code with your Nostr app to connect
bunker.compatibleApps: Compatible with nsec.app, Amber, and other NIP-46 signers
bunker.urlHelp: Paste your NIP-46 bunker connection URL

createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.description: New to Nostr? Get started with nstart.me
